isis.stitle: ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1992 - 1993 - CONNECTOR AND TERMINAL IDENTIFICATION

svcproc.title: CONNECTOR AND TERMINAL IDENTIFICATION
svcproc.para: Connectors are indicated in the circuit diagrams using various symbols, with the connector number next to the symbol. Single wire connectors are not numbered. Specific terminal arrangement and circuit identification for each connector are shown in the connector composite views. The composite views will show circuit wire location, stamped pin connector markings, and the connector number.
